sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: Ask the requester's Manager for approval
Query the inventory
Update Laptop Inventory table, Set Status = "Assigned", Assigner = "New Hire".
Send an email to notify the Manager : "The laptop request has been rejected and the inventory is insufficient."
Send an email to notify the Manager: "The laptop request has been approved."
Send an email to notify the Manager: "New hire onboarding completed", CC New Hire and IT admin.
Waiting for New Hire pickup laptop, and complete onboarding event.
Create one record for New Hire in Equipment Request table.
Send an email to notify the Manager : "The laptop request has been rejected and the inventory is insufficient."
Select the catalog item and variables to use in your flow
